Package DatabaseAccess

Class DBAppointment

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAccess.DBAppointment
public class DBAppointment extends Object
This class holds SQL database queries dealing directly with appointments
Author:
Dom Brown-Gonzalez, dbro558@wgu.edu version 1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • DBAppointment

      public DBAppointment()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      getAllAppointments Queries database for all data from appointments table. Populates list with appointments between current localdatetime and one month from current localdatetime.
      Returns:
      returns apptsList, a list of appointment data between SQL NOW() and SQL NOW() plus one month.

    • appointmentIn15

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentIn15()
      appointmentIn15 Queries database for appointments within the next 15 minutes. Populates list with appointments between current SQL datetime and 15 minutes from current SQL datetime. Uses LocalDateTime.now() as starting point, which is then turned into a ZonedDateTime, then a string to set into the SQL string
      Returns:
      returns apptIn15, a list of appointment data between SQL NOW() and SQL NOW() plus 15 minutes.

    • getAllAppointmentsWkly

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsWkly(String date)
      getAllAppointmentsWkly Queries database for all appointment data given a date parameter. Populates list with appointments for a week given a selected date.
      Parameters:
      date - The user's selected date.
      Returns:
      returns apptsListWkly, a list of appointment data between selected date and one week from that selected date.

    • getAllAppointmentsMonthly

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsMonthly(String year, String month)
      getAllAppointmentsMonthly Queries database for all appointment data given year and month parameters. Populates list with a month's worth of appointments given a selected year and month.
      Parameters:
      year - The user's selected year.
      month - The user's selected month.
      Returns:
      returns apptsList, a list of a month's appointments given year and month.

    • getAppointmentsByTypeMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<MonthlyTypeCountReport> getAppointmentsByTypeMonth()
      getAppointmentsByTypeMonth Queries database for count of appointment types by month. Populates list with appointment types, for display in a tableview.
      Returns:
      returns typeCountReport, a list of appointment types and the count of those types ordered by type, year and month.

    • getAllAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsByContact(String contactName)
      getAllAppointmentsByContact Queries database for appointment data. Populates list with appointments given a contact's name.
      Parameters:
      contactName - The selected contact name.
      Returns:
      returns apptsByContactList, a list of appointment data dependant upon selected contact name.

    • getAllAppointmentsByCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsByCustomer(String customerName)
      getAllAppointmentsByCustomer Queries database for appointment data. Populates list with appointments given selected customer name.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The selected customer name;
      Returns:
      returns apptsByCustomerList, a list of a single customer's appointments.

    • apptAddNew

      public static void apptAddNew(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      apptAddNew Inserts a new appointment into the database. Adds user input and predetermined values to an appointment object for insertion into database.
      Parameters:
      title - appointment title
      description - appointment description
      location - appointment location
      type - appointment type
      start - appointment start date/time
      end - appointment end date/time
      customerId - id of customer associated with appointment
      userId - id of user associated with appointment
      contactId - id of contact associated with appointment

    • apptDelete

      public static void apptDelete(int appointmentId)
      apptDelete Deletes an appointment from the database. Deletes an appointment from the database, given an appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The appointment ID of the appointment to be deleted.

    • deleteApptByCustomer

      public static void deleteApptByCustomer(int customerId)
      deleteApptByCustomer Deletes a given customer's appointments from the database. Deletes a given customer's appointments from the database based on selected customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The selected customer ID.

    • apptUpdate

      public static void apptUpdate(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      apptUpdate Updates an appointment in the database. Updates data associated with a selected appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The appointment ID used to select the appointment.
      title - the appointment title
      description - the appointment description
      location - the appointment location
      type - the appointment type
      start - the appointment start date/time
      end - the appointment end date/time
      lastUpdatedBy - user that last updated the appointment
      customerId - customer ID associated with the appointment
      userId - user ID associated with the appointment
      contactId - contact ID associated with the appointment

    • getAllAppointmentsRefresh

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsRefresh()
      getAllAppointmentsRefresh Queries database for all appointment data. Populates list with appointments ordered by appointment ID.
      Returns:
      returns apptsListRefresh, an ordered list of all appointment data.

    • lastUpdatedAppt

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> lastUpdatedAppt()
      lastUpdatedAppt Queries database for appointment data. Populates list with last updated (newest) appointment.
      Returns:
      returns lastUpdatedList, a list of appointment data between SQL NOW() and SQL NOW() plus one month.
